Sentencas: In this work, the effect of microwave sintering on the properties of scandia doped zirconia (10 mol% scandia in zirconia) was investigated.
Titulo: Effect of Microwave Sintering on the Properties of Zirconia Based Ceramic Electrolytes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The sample was prepared by mixed oxide method and the sintering was done at the temperature of 1400 degrees C for 20 min using a 2.45 GHz microwave furnace.
Titulo: Effect of Microwave Sintering on the Properties of Zirconia Based Ceramic Electrolytes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Sintering behavior of this microwave sintered ceramics was compared with the corresponding conventional sintered ceramics, sintered at 1400 degrees C for 6 h in a conventional furnace.
Titulo: Effect of Microwave Sintering on the Properties of Zirconia Based Ceramic Electrolytes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: It was found that both the sintering processes produced highly dense samples.
Titulo: Effect of Microwave Sintering on the Properties of Zirconia Based Ceramic Electrolytes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction analysis confirmed the presence of only cubic structure in both the samples.
Titulo: Effect of Microwave Sintering on the Properties of Zirconia Based Ceramic Electrolytes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy study was done for micro-structural analysis.
Titulo: Effect of Microwave Sintering on the Properties of Zirconia Based Ceramic Electrolytes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Further, electrical conductivity was studied from room temperature to 500 degrees C in the frequency range of 1 kHz to 1 MHz.
Titulo: Effect of Microwave Sintering on the Properties of Zirconia Based Ceramic Electrolytes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Higher ionic conductivity was recorded for microwave sintered sample than the corresponding conventional sintered sample.
Titulo: Effect of Microwave Sintering on the Properties of Zirconia Based Ceramic Electrolytes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
